languages.text: Даже после гибели Инцендии Футфол не смог вздохнуть спокойно. Учрежденные ей порядки рьяно поддерживались религиозными лидерами и командирами исповедальных бригад. Великий трибунал, подобный тому, что устроила Инцендия, проводился каждый терранский год. И каждый терранский год ему предшествовал бунт ожесточившихся, измученных людей.

Even after Incendia's death, Footfall could not find peace. Religious leaders and commanders of confessional units kept up the order she had established with zeal. A great tribunal, akin to the one that Incendia held, now took place every Terran year. And every year it was preceded by the rioting of exhausted and embittered citizens.
languages.original_text: Даже после гибели Инцендии Футфол не смог вздохнуть спокойно. Учрежденные ей порядки рьяно поддерживались религиозными лидерами и командирами исповедальных бригад. Великий трибунал, подобный тому, что устроила Инцендия, проводился каждый терранский год. И каждый терранский год ему предшествовал бунт ожесточившихся, измученных людей.

traits.locale_text: Even after the death of Incendia Footfall could not find peace. Religious leaders and commanders of confessional units kept up the order she established. The great trial, akin to the one that Incendia held, now took place every Terran cycle. And every cycle it was preceded with a riot of embittered, forworn people.

Even after the death of Incendia Footfall could not find peace. Religious leaders and commanders of confessional units kept up the order she established. The great trial, akin to the one that Incendia held, now took place every Terran cycle. And every cycle it was preceded with a riot of embittered, forworn people.

Even after Incendia's death, Footfall could not find peace. Religious leaders and commanders of confessional units kept up the order she established with zeal. A great trial, akin to the one that Incendia held, now took place every Terran cycle. And every cycle it was preceded by a riot of exhausted and embittered citizens.

A great trial, akin to the one that Incendia held, now took place every Terran cycle. And every cycle it was preceded by a riot of exhausted and embittered citizens.

Even after Incendia's death, Footfall could not find peace. Religious leaders and commanders of confessional units kept up the order she had established with zeal. A great tribunal, akin to the one that Incendia held, now took place every Terran cycle. And every cycle it was preceded by the rioting of exhausted and embittered citizens.

Even after Incendia's death, Footfall could not find peace. Religious leaders and commanders of confessional units kept up the order she had established with zeal. A great tribunal, akin to the one that Incendia held, now took place every Terran cycle. And every cycle it was preceded by the rioting of exhausted and embittered citizens.

Even after Incendia's death, Footfall could not find peace. Religious leaders and commanders of confessional units kept up the order she had established with zeal. A great tribunal, akin to the one that Incendia held, now took place every Terran year. And every year it was preceded by the rioting of exhausted and embittered citizens.

languages.text: 即便是在因森蒂娅死后，落脚港也没有恢复平静。宗教领袖和忏悔者指挥官仍然在狂热地维系着因森蒂娅所建立的秩序。每隔一个泰拉年，落脚港都会举行一场类似于当年因森蒂娅所举行的大审判。而在此之前，总会有一群精疲力竭、忍无可忍的公民掀起暴乱。
languages.original_text: Even after Incendia's death, Footfall could not find peace. Religious leaders and commanders of confessional units kept up the order she had established with zeal. A great tribunal, akin to the one that Incendia held, now took place every Terran year. And every year it was preceded by the rioting of exhausted and embittered citizens.

traits.locale_text: 即便是在因森蒂娅死后，落脚港也没有恢复平静。宗教领袖和忏悔者指挥官仍然在狂热地维系着因森蒂娅所建立的秩序。每隔一个泰拉年，落脚港都会举行一场类似于当年因森蒂娅所举行的大审判。而在此之前，总会有一群精疲力竭、忍无可忍的公民掀起暴乱。

languages.text: Selbst nach Incendias Tod fand Footfall keinen Frieden. Religiöse Anführer und Kommandanten konfessioneller Einheiten hielten die von ihr etablierte Ordnung mit großem Eifer aufrecht. Einmal pro terranischem Jahr fand nun ein großes Tribunal wie jenes statt, das Incendia abgehalten hatte. Und in jedem Jahr kam es davor zu einem Aufstand erschöpfter und verbitterter Bürger.
languages.original_text: Even after Incendia's death, Footfall could not find peace. Religious leaders and commanders of confessional units kept up the order she had established with zeal. A great tribunal, akin to the one that Incendia held, now took place every Terran year. And every year it was preceded by the rioting of exhausted and embittered citizens.

traits.locale_text: Selbst nach Incendias Tod fand Footfall keinen Frieden. Religiöse Anführer und Kommandanten konfessioneller Einheiten hielten die von ihr etablierte Ordnung mit großem Eifer aufrecht. Einmal pro terranischem Zyklus fand nun ein großer Prozess wie jene statt, die Incendia abgehalten hatte. Und in jedem Zyklus kam es davor zu einem Aufstand erschöpfter und verbitterter Bürger.

languages.text: La mort d'Incendia ne ramena pas la paix à Castel. Les chefs religieux et les commandants des unités confessionnelles assurèrent la survie de l'ordre qu'elle avait établi avec tant de zèle. De grands procès, semblables à celui organisé par Incendia, se tinrent désormais à chaque an de Terra, non sans être systématiquement précédés par des émeutes de citoyens épuisés et mécontents.
languages.original_text: Even after Incendia's death, Footfall could not find peace. Religious leaders and commanders of confessional units kept up the order she had established with zeal. A great tribunal, akin to the one that Incendia held, now took place every Terran year. And every year it was preceded by the rioting of exhausted and embittered citizens.

traits.locale_text: La mort d'Incendia ne ramena pas la paix à Castel. Les chefs religieux et les commandants des unités confessionnelles assurèrent la survie de l'ordre qu'elle avait établi avec tant de zèle. De grands procès, semblables à celui organisé par Incendia, se tinrent désormais à chaque cycle terrien, non sans être systématiquement précédés par des émeutes de citoyens épuisés et mécontents.

languages.text: Incluso después de la muerte de Incendia, Paso no consiguió encontrar la paz. Los líderes religiosos y los comandantes de las unidades confesionales mantenían el orden que estableció con fervor. Cada año terrano se celebraba un gran juicio similar al de Incendia, y cada año estaba precedido de una revuelta de los ciudadanos agotados y amargados.
languages.original_text: Even after Incendia's death, Footfall could not find peace. Religious leaders and commanders of confessional units kept up the order she had established with zeal. A great tribunal, akin to the one that Incendia held, now took place every Terran year. And every year it was preceded by the rioting of exhausted and embittered citizens.

traits.locale_text: Incluso después de la muerte de Incendia, Paso no consiguió encontrar la paz. Los líderes religiosos y los comandantes de las unidades confesionales mantenían el orden que estableció con fervor. Cada ciclo terrano se celebraba un gran juicio similar al de Incendia, y cada ciclo estaba precedido de una revuelta de los ciudadanos agotados y amargados.

languages.text: インセンディアの死後もなお、フットフォールに平穏は訪れなかった。宗教指導者と懺悔部隊を率いる面々が、彼女の体制に嬉々として従い続けたのだ。インセンディアが開いたものと酷似した大法廷が、地球年が巡るたびに開かれるようになった。年が巡り開廷が近づくと、疲れ果て恨みを募らせた市民たちが暴動を起こすことが慣例となった。
languages.original_text: Even after Incendia's death, Footfall could not find peace. Religious leaders and commanders of confessional units kept up the order she had established with zeal. A great tribunal, akin to the one that Incendia held, now took place every Terran year. And every year it was preceded by the rioting of exhausted and embittered citizens.

traits.locale_text: インセンディアの死後もなお、フットフォールに平穏は訪れなかった。宗教指導者と懺悔部隊を率いる面々が、彼女の体制に嬉々として従い続けたのだ。インセンディアが開いたものと酷似した大法廷が、地球年が巡るたびに開かれるようになった。年が巡り開廷が近づくと、疲れ果て恨みを募らせた市民たちが暴動を起こすことが慣例となった。

languages.text: İncendia'nın ölümünden sonra bile Binliman huzur bulamadı. Dinî liderler ve günah çıkarma birimlerinin komutanları, İncendia'nın büyük bir tutkuyla kurduğu düzeni devam ettirdi. Artık her Terra yılında, bitkin ve küskün yurttaşlar ayaklanması üzerine onun kurduğuna benzer, büyük bir mahkeme kurulur oldu.
languages.original_text: Even after Incendia's death, Footfall could not find peace. Religious leaders and commanders of confessional units kept up the order she had established with zeal. A great tribunal, akin to the one that Incendia held, now took place every Terran year. And every year it was preceded by the rioting of exhausted and embittered citizens.

traits.locale_text: İncendia'nın ölümünden sonra bile Binliman huzur bulamadı. Dinî liderler ve günah çıkarma birimlerinin komutanları, İncendia'nın büyük bir tutkuyla kurduğu düzeni devam ettirdi. Artık her Terra yılında, bitkin ve küskün yurttaşlar ayaklanması üzerine onun kurduğuna benzer, büyük bir mahkeme kurulur oldu.
